text: Face is a 1997 British crime drama thriller movie. It was directed by Antonia Bird and written by Ronan Bennett. The movie stars Robert Carlyle and Ray Winstone and features the rock singer Damon Albarn (Blur, Gorillaz) in his first acting job. ==Other websites== * Category:1997 crime drama movies Category:1997 crime thriller movies Category:1990s drama thriller movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:British drama thriller movies Category:Movies set in London
title: Face (movie)
